course_title: Seminar in Poetry:English: Contemporary American Poetry
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 15 / Seats Avail: 1Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
Course Topic: Contemporary American Poetry
Course Description: 
This seminar will survey major poets, schools and movements that make up the canon of Contemporary American Poetry in conversation with emerging voices from the present. Special attention will be devoted to the Black Aesthetic, the Beat generation, feminist poetics, and recent verse of new social movements.
course_description: Studies in poetry. Readings may focus on one or more authors or poetic traditions. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
schedule_location: MW 10am-11:15am in Emerson Chemistry Bldg. E101
